text: The first inauguration of Harry S. Truman as the 33rd president of the United States happened on April 12, 1945. This was the beginning of Harry S. Truman's first term as president. This inauguration happened after the sudden death of President Franklin D. Roosevelt. ==References== Category:1945 in the United States Category:Harry S. Truman Truman, Harry S.
title: First inauguration of Harry S. Truman
